thread.section_title: Seton Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel, good location
thread.title_full: Good hotel, good location - Review of Seton Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jonathan M
title: Good hotel, good location
text:
We stayed for 3 nights at the Seton hotel and found it to be a very well located just near Grand Central Station, so we were able to just have a 5 min walk to the subway.
The staff were extremely pleasant and welcoming during our stay also very helpful with recommendations.
The room was nice, we had read online that there are rooms with shared bathrooms so we ensured we booked a room we an ensuite, now the only issue with the hotel was the see through door to the ensuite bathroom so we one of us went to use the toilet you can see them sat on the toilet a little bit weird!
Overall we are looking to return to NYC and will look to stay at the seton again
